metadata.description: Configuration for detectors used for algorithm inputs and solver inputs.

algorithm_input_detectors.description: List of detector IDs used for calculating the primary algorithm input, such as total vehicle accumulation in the controlled area.

mfd_input_flow_detectors.description: List of detector IDs used for calculating the flow.

solver_input_detectors.description: Mapping of detectors to specific intersections and phases for providing real-time data to the optimization solver, such as queue lengths.
